fullDescription:
Join us as we celebrate the 70th Anniversary of our beloved institution — a historic milestone that brings together alumni from all generations. This grand event will serve as a powerful reunion, honoring our legacy, reconnecting old friends, and building bridges across alumni communities.

Expect a weekend filled with nostalgia, networking, entertainment, and reflection on seven decades of excellence, growth, and shared memories. Whether you graduated recently or decades ago, this celebration is for you.

Let’s come together to honor the past, celebrate the present, and inspire the future.
title: 70th Anniversary Celebration
